## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intervalmapimpl">IntervalMapImpl</a> - Namespace used for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intervalmap">IntervalMap</a> implementation details.

It should be considered private to the implementation.

### distribute() {#adc507d70d9385ae35dcdb70dc1bebc19}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>IdxPair llvm::IntervalMapImpl::distribute (unsigned Nodes, unsigned Elements, unsigned Capacity, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> unsigned &#42; CurSize, unsigned NewSize=[], unsigned Position, bool Grow)</>}>
<a href="#adc507d70d9385ae35dcdb70dc1bebc19">IntervalMapImpl::distribute</a> - Compute a new distribution of node elements after an overflow or underflow.

Reserve space for a new element at Position, and compute the node that will hold Position after redistributing node elements.

It is required that

Elements == sum(CurSize), and Elements + Grow &lt;= Nodes &#42; Capacity.

NewSize&#91;&#93; will be filled in such that:

sum(NewSize) == Elements, and NewSize&#91;i&#93; &lt;= Capacity.

The returned index is the node where Position will go, so:

sum(NewSize&#91;0..idx-1&#93;) &lt;= Position sum(NewSize&#91;0..idx&#93;) &gt;= Position

The last equality, sum(NewSize&#91;0..idx&#93;) == Position, can only happen when Grow is set and NewSize&#91;idx&#93; == Capacity-1. The index points to the node before the one holding the Position&#39;th element where there is room for an insertion.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Nodes">The number of nodes.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Elements">Total elements in all nodes.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Capacity">The capacity of each node.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="CurSize">Array&#91;Nodes&#93; of current node sizes, or NULL.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="NewSize">Array&#91;Nodes&#93; to receive the new node sizes.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Position">Insert position.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Grow">Reserve space for a new element at Position.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
(node, offset) for Position.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/intervalmap-cpp/#l00120">120</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/intervalmap-cpp">IntervalMap.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
